channel.description: Recent content in maitso on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Kiborin
item.description: Kiborin is our 4th gen HB from Blossom x Maitso. He is Blaitso’s brother. These two are just amazing animals and we are excited to see Kiborin’s clean yellow with blue. He has less red highlighting that his father and a really clean look! Kiborin Kiborin1 Kiborin2 Kiborin3 Kiborin4 Filial F4-CG13 Sire Blossom Dam Maitso 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Kiborin (F4-CG13) Generation 1 1. Kiborin (F4-CG13). Kiborin was born on 2021-06-19 at iPardalis.

item.title: Blaitso
item.description: Blaitso is a drop dead gorgeous 4th gen female from our Blossom x Maitso. She has vibrant oranges, a great bar/body contrast and teal cheeks. Her lineage is also amazing so she will be fun to watch! We are lucky to have her in our breeding group. Blaitso Blaitso1 Blaitso2 Blaitso3 Blaitso4 Blaitso5 Filial F4-CG13 Sire Blossom Dam Maitso 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Blaitso (F4-CG13) Generation 1 1.

item.title: Blossom x Maitso
item.description: This pairing was between our third generation hold back, Blossom, and our female from Bobby Ruddock, Maitso. Maitso is from one of our favorite yellow-bodied blue bar Ambilobe, Amarillo, and Blossom is the HB male from our Jude x Alla clutch. Great combination of colorful ybbb and clean yellows! Kiborin is our keeper from this group. Blossom x Maitso Hatch dates 1/27/2021 - 3/07/2021 Hatch rate 25/27 1st 10th

item.title: Maitso
item.description: Maitso’s sire, Amarillo, is the top yellow boby blue bar Ambilobe in the USA. He is a vibrant yellow from snout to vent without any red to mess with what he has going on. The only way I could concieve of a way to improve upon him is to get some thicker blue bars on him and get rid of the red on his turrets. We’ll see what we can do!
